QuestData.Title: A Village in Peril
QuestData.Description: Another outsider? Some bloke named Jarod just went off to our village down the road claiming he might be able to help us with our problem.$b$bIf you're here to help as well, then you best speak to the Mayor.$b$bJust know this is a bad time, and he's got an itchy trigger finger.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Mayor Heathrow at Bradensbrook.
